website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR1-RNC offers laudable audio quality and solid noise cancellation, but despite top-notch performance, it's priced too high.
pros: Distortion-free audio performance with rich bass and crisp highs
Includes two detachable audio cables, one with inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: No battery charger or Â¼-inch adapter included

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the MDR 1RNC. These headphones are for work where in our office we have very low cubicle walls and you can hear every conversation. I turn on the NC and find most all conversations are so faint I don't notice them. I add some music to the headphones and I cannot hear anything else around. They have nice large deep ear pockets so your ears are not smashed after a long day listening.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones help you appreciate music again. They are well built, look great and sound great. The only reason I gave four stars is that the high end can sometimes be a little "tinny" sometimes is just a little "shrill" on some songs. I read about this before purchasing on some Amazon reviews and got an equalizer app which is great. I found the Noise Cancelling feature was better than Bose and the Sony headphones were more comfortable as well. Sony also had a better build quality. The Bose put pressure on the ear drum, the Sony's did not. These are great for airplanes! A nice bonus is the carrying case. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: c24

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Odered the MDR1RNC on Monday and received them on Tuesday. Amazon is just outstanding! The headphones were extraordinary. Have experienced impressive headphones in the past, but this was the first time I came to an understanding of the description "richer sound." Clearly, previously heard albums were now more colorful, detailed, covering a wider range, with considerably more depth. It was as if I was listening to a different album. There is no doubt they will be an important part of my traveling gear. Thanks Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart J. Greif

customer_reviews.title: My headphones are awesome! I have to hide them from my grandson ...
customer_reviews.text: My headphones are awesome! I have to hide them from my grandson who constantly tries to borrow them, perhaps I should reward him with a pair this Christmas. When I have them on I have no distractions just total relaxation and into the music of my choice which often times is jazz. I have already raved about them to my family members, friends, and co-workers. Thank you so...just one question "Do they come in wireless?" If yes please send information to my home email: cdessa@aol.com Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Noise Cancellation Headphone
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation is a little bit off the Bose QC25 but the sound qty is much better. The build qty is excellent, I compare this to PSB, B&W, Bose, and Beat before I buy this and I am pretty sure I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones - cheap connector!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones(better than Bose that I had before).I was concerned about the rechargeable battery life but they totally exceeded my expectations and was fine on a 16hr flight. I would have given this 5 stars but the single to dual connector that is often used on planes broke on the first flight. Its only held together by 1 screw and cheap plastic. The Bose one supplied was one piece and a molded assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very good sounding headphones with an annoying flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sounding headphones with an annoying flaw. There are vents in the design, that on a windy day the wind will rush in and make a very loud noise. loud enough to almost block out to whatever you are listening to. Also if you are looking for bass heavy and very loud headphones like beats. these are not the headphones for you. I could do without the heavy bass, but i like to listen to music very loudly. i have to turn my ipod volume probably 95% to get the volume i want.
customer_reviews.author: Crayon Shidae

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Got my headphones today. ..I own over 20 phones to date mostly noise canceling. ...these are right up thete with the very best..music so clear and distinct its unbelievable....my only reservation being the charging style..otherwise wonderful investment. .go grab yourself a unit..investment wisely!
customer_reviews.author: yanjumoye

customer_reviews.title: Obscures Crappy Health Club Music
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I wear them when working out and the sound canceling eliminates all the awful "club" music playing at my health club. I got them as an "open-box" buy and saved a bunch of money!
customer_reviews.author: Greg G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Sony headphones, brought this pair to replace my MDR-7506s which were my previous travel headphones. But I use those at work but still operating fine after 4 years. The MDR1RNC are more comfortable, excellent sound quality and the case and accessories are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rouse

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very comfortable to wear, but that is about their only advantage. In the realms of noise cancelation and sound quality, you can do much better in this price range. I went back to my Bose QC15 shortly after giving these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sandin

customer_reviews.title: These are a winner.
customer_reviews.text: These are over the ear noise canceling headphones. The noise canceling is very effective. When NC is turned off, they function and sound as well as my MDR-1R headphones. Same styling, same comfort. These are a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, very good NC
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling: Very good, you don't know how much white noise there is in the house until you put these on. I will note that the modes are a mixed blessing, the NC can't completely block out noisy roommates and computer fan both, although at worst they are both heavily reduced. Sound: Excellent. I was particularly impressed by the bass, whether you are listening to heavy metal or classical cello, the lows come through. Force and nuance come across with equal clarity.
customer_reviews.author: OutThere

customer_reviews.title: Purchase and took really good care of them and stored in the special Sony ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase and took really good care of them and stored in the special Sony headphone case shipped in. The headphones were never dropped and the right left side. Have not been able to use them and trying to find the parts to repair them.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie F. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Travel Phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on the say-so of a travel pro who himself did not have a pair but who preferred these to the set he has (brand name withheld). They are substantial, comfy, offer truly superior, balanced sound, and they look every bit as cool as the Beats Executive that I was aiming for. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TonyCultEx

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but the noise cancellation misses nearly all ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, but the noise cancellation misses nearly all aircraft engine noise, had no choice but to find another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, okay noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight hissing noise when you turn on the noise cancellation but apart from that the sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.author: tushar

customer_reviews.title: Sony over the ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. They get a little warm when I'm walking the treadmill for several miles and they get a little heavy, but they are otherwise fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: George E. Munger

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Head phones do not cancel-out as much ambient noise as hoped. I had an old $45 set of Sony headphones with a better noise reduction performance. I find it necessary to remove my hearing-aids to use the headphones. However, these headphones are much more comfortable and do make a long flight more tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D Woods

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: best build quality, best sound quality and great noise cancellation!! What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Georgios

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling actually works. I thought the product would be wireless and I look dumb sometimes walking on campus with the string coming from my phone but it's perfect outside of this.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality ... a little heavy for long-hour use.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Surprise birthday present was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. Simple as that. My hubby loved it. He's been talking for some time about getting noise canceling headphones since his job change the beginning of the year and having to fly very long international flights. He was truly surprised and thought it was far greater than Bose for their music listening abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rexroth

customer_reviews.title: The best sound experience and comfort i've had from a set ...
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. After a while you will start to hear that 'white noise' sound that is used in office areas. The best sound experience and comfort i've had from a set of serious headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Titan480

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and looks awesome Against
customer_reviews.text: For: Great build quality and looks awesome Against: If noise cancelling is off sound is terrible. With noise cancelling on it has a great sound
customer_reviews.author: Gielie

customer_reviews.title: Tokyo
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones. I was in Tokyo at the Sony Headquarters when I put the headphones on....... I knew I had to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: :D
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a present for my boy friend, a musician. He loooooooves it !!
customer_reviews.author: Saving Tress

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, excellent sound quality. They're a bit pricey, but I don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound amazing. I haven't been able to test the noise canceling on a flight, but it works great in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones, with high quality sound. They're really a premium product!!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar J

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I live overseas much of the year. I bought these for her as a gift for the many airplane and train trips we take. So far, we've been very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation is NOT effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones primarily as noise-canceling headphones so I could make working with my noisy coworkers more tolerable....and these do not help. In fact, turning the noise-canceling function on the headphones OFF does a better job than with it on. Very disappointed with this aspect. On the plus side, the headphones are comfortable and the sound quality is good. And there's no need for replaceable batteries, as it can charge with a USB cord, which is nice. I will probably still use these as regular headphones but I will probably pick up the Bose QC15 for noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bose previously but refer the Sony headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: very good product. The noise canceling effect is as good as expected. The out look is fashionable and charming. In a nutshell, it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jun Zhong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The headset arrived promptly and works perfectly. No complaints. Will use this seller again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mouncef Belcaid

customer_reviews.title: no noise at all
customer_reviews.text: These are great - my Bose headphones were 'lifted' and I replaced them with these. Very satisfactory - use them on airplanes and they are GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: bookchick77

customer_reviews.title: MDR1A over MDR1RNC
customer_reviews.text: I had my eyes set on only noise canceling, I then realized that the noise canceling distorts the quality of the headphones and that's why I'm returning them. Now I am getting the newer version of these headphones and much less expensive and at a reasonable price. The Sony mdr1a headphones support hi RES files unlike these mdr1rnc noise canceling cans. You can hear more detail and there is less blurriness and noise.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Cuida

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Cannot love it more, this is just what I was looking for! :) I'm more than satisfied with its color and design and features, everything!
customer_reviews.author: Sue,

customer_reviews.title: The best one
customer_reviews.text: The best one. This is the best headphone in the market. Confortable and imponent. Uses a internal battery.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Heavier then the competitions. But the weight makes for better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable after long sessions of listening
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use these headphones to listen to music while I code at the office. Unfortunately after long coding sessions (more than an hour), I've found that the weight of the cans begins to press down on the top of my head. It becomes uncomfortable to the point that I need to revert to my cheaper, but lighter earbuds. The Noise-Canceling function is decent, but they're my first noise-canceling headphones so I have nothing to compare them to.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Kirksey

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with I Pad
customer_reviews.text: So I ignored the warning that when used with an I Pad for watching video (not only Netflix but also TV on your I Pad), the lip movements do not match the voices....it is like watching a foreign movie dubbed in English. This is in the Bluetooth mode but this annoyance dissapears when you plug the phones into your device. So in that case, why bother buying the Bluetooth version of the Sony headphones? Precisely my point.....after much research, I settled on the Parrot ZIK phones; acutally made of metal and not plastic....imagine that? I am very happy with this choice; excellent sound and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation feature is great - with other headphones you hear background noise (e.g. refrigerator), but with this headphone this noise get filtered out.
customer_reviews.author: Bernd Saggau

customer_reviews.title: Sound is decent with noise canceling on, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is decent with noise canceling on, but the headphone put some strain on my ears after a long period of use . Could be lighter and expected more from sony
customer_reviews.author: Wai Lin Thein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound.
customer_reviews.text: It has perfect sound quality. If you have amp. too u feel the power easily. Only bad thing is volume control buttons don't work with android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Panther

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Best speakers out there under $500. The sound and the noise canceling make it one of the best speakers I have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Isaias Zamarripa

customer_reviews.title: right choice
customer_reviews.text: I like this model, as HIFI headphone I could say it's excellent when I listen to music on my PCM-D50
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not even a single star!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these, The quality is really bad!! Audio is not great, quality of ear pads is HORRIBLE, This is not what you get when you pay that amount of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Vahid

customer_reviews.title: Might Poke Your Ears
customer_reviews.text: Maybe great headphones, strangely the inside of the ear cups have a piece (part of the noise canceling mic) that sticks out a little. My wife & her family couldn't feel the protruding piece much, if at all. But for me at first it tickled a little, but the tickle quickly grew to discomfort, eventually creating soreness on my earlobe. Not what I want to expect from headphones at a high price point.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Chose product for NC, and that's what I did not get.
customer_reviews.text: The primary purpose for choosing this headphone was for the NC. The product was received in a condition where it would work as a headphone only. when attempting to charge the battery, the charging light blinks indicating the headphones are malfuntioning. An attempt to return to seller was denied due to a 30 day rule...which works against my situation when I had it shipped 5 weeks before returning to the country. I'm sure I would be happier spending less money on the Bose QC15 and having the NC work dependably as I travel often, and have no time to follow up with any Sony dealer in US or outside.
customer_reviews.author: James H Eberle

product_meta.title: Sony MDR1RNC Premium Noise-Canceling Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description: Countless details combined to deliver: precision sound quality, thoughtful design, and long-term comfort. Available in three models, including Bluetooth and Digital Noise Canceling capable models, Sony MDR-1R headphones offer premium style with performance for a headphone experience without equal.
feature_bullets: Precision noise canceling–reduces up to 99% ambient noise
Full-auto AINC auto noise canceling function with Dual Noise Sensor technology for optimized performance
Enfolding structure delivers wrap around comfort and an improved acoustic seal for improved bass response
Comfortable ear pads deliver powerful bass response and long-term comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars107 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
